snippet: The judge overseeing Jerry Sandusky’s child sex abuse case on Friday denied the defense’s request to have the charges dismissed, leaving all 52 counts intact with opening statements three days away.
lead_paragraph: The judge overseeing Jerry Sandusky’s child sex abuse case on Friday denied the defense’s request to have the charges dismissed, leaving all 52 counts intact with opening statements three days away.

headline.seo: Judge Denies Motions to Dismiss Sandusky Sex Charges
headline.main: Judge Denies Motions to Dismiss Sandusky Sex Charges
